name: Telekinetic
description:
Description:
Telekinetic - indie horror, with not complicated puzzles, but with a mysterious story.
You come to your senses in a strange place, around the damaged bodies of people and a lot of blood, you have a head pierced and, instead of the left hand, its mechanical likeness, which is endowed with an interesting feature - telekinesis.

Game Features:
  • Telekinesis - you can pick up and throw a variety of items, as well as solve some puzzles.
  • History - your story is short, but it is covered with mystery, and it also has several possible finals.
  • Atmosphere - immerse yourself in an atmosphere of fear and gloom.
